title: Practical Application of Management Accounting Changes in Networked Organizations (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting knowledge, organizational structure comprehension, and practical experience in scientific fields
context.additional_context: A course where in-service professionals learn application cases of the management accounting system (LMAS) in networked organizational settings and enhance practical problem-solving skills through experiential learning approaches

learning_goals: Can distinguish and utilize Type 1 (accountability) and Type 2 (problem-solving) management accounting information in networked organizational environments
Can explain how LMAS (Local Management Accounting System) contributes to organizational innovation and process improvement through case analysis
Can design and implement management accounting change strategies in real-world work scenarios using experiential learning approaches
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
